PMshortcut.message: Shortcut to launch the profile manager

advancedLabel1.message: With these options you can change the behaviour

advancedLabel2.message: of the program when it's called by another application

asPanel.message: In a statusbar panel (on the right)

asPanelLeft.message: In a statusbar panel (on the left)

confirmSafeMode.message: In order to run profilemanager in safe-mode, the current profile will be automatically closed. Do you want to continue?

emptyDisable.message: Leave the field blank to disable

execLabel.message: Set a path here when auto-detection doesn't work

extDesc.message: Adds options to launch other profiles

extensions.pswitcher2@dillinger.descript.message: Adds profile name to status bar tooltip and options to launch other profiles

iconicTooltipLine1.message: To change the default profile, launch the profile manager

iconicTooltipLine2.message: closing all the profiles in use,then select in the profile manager

iconicTooltipLine3.message: the profile that you want as default one and launch it.

iconicTooltipLine5.message: will not change the default profile.

loadCurrentPage.label.message: Open profile loading the current page

logDesc.message: Clicking the OK button will restart the program with the log enabled.

logDialogTitle.message: Select the protocols to be included in the log file

logErrorNoPath.message: Error! Choose a destination for the log file.

logErrorNoProtocol.message: Error! Select at least a protocol to be included in the log file.

mustRestart.message: You must restart the program to enable this option

newInstance.message: Use 'new_instance' to launch the other profiles

noexecfile.message: Impossible to find the executable file. To fix this, set a valid path in the options window.

optionCaption.message: Behaviour when you run another profile or profilemanager:

quityesno.message: Quit the current profile before switching profiles?

quityesno2.message: Quit the current profile before launching the profile manager?

unknownos.message: Unable to comply: operative system not supported
